results.title: The Killer nun = Suor omicidi [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Giulio Berruti, Enzo Gallo and Cinesud
results.brief_description: A former ‘video-nasty’ and one of the few examples of the perversely themed ‘nunsploitation’ genre, which is basically a thinly veiled excuse for some soft core erotica. The usual ingredients for this genre are all present in The Killer nun, that being drug addicted nuns, lesbianism, sadism, murder, necrophilia and lashings of nudity. Anita Ekberg stars as sister Gertrude a sexually repressed, morphine addicted nun who descends into madness when her elderly patients begin to get murdered, making her the prime suspect. Soon enough the unhinged sister is shooting up, having sex with strange men and making inappropriate advances at her fellow sisters. Cast includes Joe Dallesandro, Alida Valli, Lou Castel. Also known as Suor omicidi.

results.title: The Kelly story (AFC)
results.brief_description: Re-edited and re-titled from the footage remaining of “When the Kelly’s were out”, an early Australian silent film now no longer in existence as a complete unit. Represents the Kelly gang as high-spirited youths unjustly persecuted, and reasons that “Ned Kelly has not become a legend for nothing”. Photography by Tasman Higgins.

results.title: The Jolly Jumbuck
results.brief_description: A short story involving performances by a travelling puppeteer show, The Jolly Jumbuck, which is operated by the Moonee Valley Regional Library and the Library Council of Victoria. Shows their visit to a small school in Melbourne, the Pascoe Vale South Primary School, where the puppet performance is put on for grades 5 and 6. Includes footage of the colourful puppet antics and the children’s reactions. Storytellers: Neil Bell, Oliver Roznay, Rino Tomisich. Music performed by Grades 5 and 6, Pascoe Vale South Primary School.

results.title: The Intruders: cockroaches
results.brief_description: Illustrates the life cycle of the cockroach. Follows development from the time the egg is laid by the female to the adult insect. Also touches on methods of controlling this pest Narrated by James McKechnie.

results.title: The Guelph Rhizotron studies in plant root growth

results.title: The Growing of a young filmaker
results.brief_description: A documentary about a high school dropout. Uses scenes and narrative from movies which he made to show how his attitude toward learning was changed from apathy to zeal by his movie-making experiences.

results.title: The Missing interest
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Office Supervisor’s Problem”.
A dramatised case problem which can lead to searching discussion of methods of developing employee involvement and interest in low level narrow scope jobs. Supervisors can identify and project themselves into the situation. The film poses but does not answer a basic problem.

results.title: The Self made man
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Office Supervisors Problem”

Provides supervisors of office personnel with a dramatised case history that will stimulate discussion of the factors that lead to successful self development. Based on actual experience, the supervisors can identify themselves with the problem.
